name: 1 GAW - Week 6
description:
Note: This is a small prototype just for the sake of practicing game programming. I made this in about 3 days.

As the pilot of a small orbiter and armed with an asteroid deflection turret, you need to clear the space debris around your landing zone before coming in to orbit.

But look out - you only have limited fuel and ammo! So make your shots (and engine burns) count!

Mouse / Keyboard and XBox Controller are supported.

Source code: https://github.com/Reccy/1GAW_6

Note: Paid assets need to be manually added if you want to compile the game. (Shapes & Rewired)

Assets Used:

Shapes by Freya Holmér: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/shapes-173167

Rewired by Guavaman Enterprises: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/rewired-21676

NovaMono by Wojciech Kalinowski: https://www.1001freefonts.com/nova-mono.font
